title: UFC Calendar Landing Page Redesign Shipped
description: Shipped a major redesign of the UFC Calendar landing page with improved UI/UX and modern design patterns.

title: PromptCost Proxy Worker Launched
description: Launched the PromptCost Proxy Worker, a serverless Cloudflare Worker for OpenAI API logging, cost tracking, and authentication.

title: Portfolio v1 Launch
description: Initial release of my GitHub-Pages portfolio built with Lit, showcasing shipped projects and a live shipping timeline.

title: Automated Twitter Content Poster Launched
description: Launched the Cloudflare Worker for automated Twitter content posting, featuring AI-generated text and images.

title: Meme Genius AI Website Launched
description: Launched the Meme Genius AI website, featuring a gallery of AI-generated memes.

title: UFC Calendar Landing Page Launched
description: Launched the official landing page for the UFC Calendar project at ufccalendar.tech.

title: UFC Calendar Extension Launched
description: Launched the UFC Calendar Chrome Extension, providing live updates and event details for UFC fans.
